abstract: Robert B Kory, manager of recently deceased singer-songwriter Leonard Cohen, announces Cohen died peacefully in his sleep after taking fall in middle of the night; artist had spurt of increased productivity in recent years, despite numerous health problems.

headline.print_headline: A Burst of Activity, Then a Fall in the Night
headline.main: For Leonard Cohen, the End Came With a Fall in the Night

snippet: Mr. Cohen, who was known for working slowly, had picked up the pace considerably in recent years. His manager said he died in his sleep after a fall....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Cohen, who was known for working slowly, had picked up the pace considerably in recent years. His manager said he died in his sleep after a fall.
